sentences.en: Every quarrel left its mark and made Bertha more susceptible to affront.
sentences.cn: 每一次吵架都留下了裂痕,使伯莎动辄当面挑战.

sentences.en: He stepped back, affronted by the question.
sentences.cn: 他觉得这个问题语带冒犯，退后了几步。

sentences.en: He took his son's desertion as a personal affront.
sentences.cn: 他把儿子的离开看作是对他个人的侮辱.

sentences.en: His refusal to see me was an affront.
sentences.cn: 他拒绝见我,这对我是个侮辱.

sentences.en: His speech is an affront to all members of the community.
sentences.cn: 他的对话对社区所有的成员是故意的冒犯.

sentences.en: His speech was an affront to all decent members of the community.

sentences.en: His speech was an affront to them.

sentences.en: It's a personal affront to me and every member of our congress.
sentences.cn: 这对我和对我们会议的全体人员都是一种人身侮辱.

sentences.en: It's an affront to human dignity to keep someone alive like this.
sentences.cn: 让一个人如此活着是对人类尊严的一种侮辱。

sentences.en: Leaving during his speech was an affront to the speaker.
sentences.cn: 当讲话的人正在讲话时离去,是对他的一种不尊敬.

sentences.en: She has taken my enquiry as a personal affront.
sentences.cn: 她将我的询问当成了人身侮辱。

sentences.en: She views me, a white male, as a personal affront.
sentences.cn: 她将我的白种男性身份视为对她个人的一种冒犯.

sentences.en: The totalitarian world even finds symbols of love and worship an affront.
sentences.cn: 极权主义者甚至认定爱和信仰的象征是一种侮辱.

sentences.en: Your behaviour is an affront to public decency.
